mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (id, nm, userId, pw, addr1, addr2, pno, birth, regDt, regId, updateDt, updateId, useYn) VALUES (#{id}, #{nm}, #{userId}, #{pw}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{pno}, #{birth}, now(), 99999, now(), 99999, "Y")
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(userId) FROM member WHERE userId = #{value}
